basic_information.scholarship_notes: Seniors graduating in December are eligible to receive full scholarship in their last semester.

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who area majoring in Nutrition and Food Science. Eligibility Requirements HES Major: Nutrition, Dietetics, and Food Management Undergraduate or Graduate Student Minimum GPA of 2.75 Must be enrolled in the required amount of hours in the upcoming fall and spring semesters in order to be eligible to receive this scholarship. Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
